item.title: Report X-2024040766
item.description:
Report X-2024040766

Identified by scraper @ 2024-04-23T15:11:35+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-04-12
  • City: WILLINGTON
  • State: CT
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Pkg was found upside down in a lined Hazmat bin that was placed in a larger unlined plastic bin in the HMPA area. DescribePack: The 15 gal. container was dropped on its side causing an 8" crack along the edge of the container's measuring scale which allowed the liquid to leak into the two bins. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Pkg was placed in the two bins.

item.description:
Report X-2024040768

  • City: WILLINGTON

  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Wet pkg placed in lined Hazmat bin and taken to the HMPA. DescribePack: Loose caps allowed liquid to leak wetting and contaminating the contents and carton causing the carton to rip and partially dissolve. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Pkg placed in bin.

item.title: Report X-2024040935
item.description:
Report X-2024040935

Identified by scraper @ 2024-04-19T15:12:40+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-04-14
  • City: WILLINGTON
  • State: CT
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: SequenceEvent: The box was found in the unload with the side and bottom of it wet. The box was put in an unlined tote and sent to QA. DescribePack: When the package was opened up it was found that the 1 X 42 oz bottle of Drano had a loose cap and was on its side in the box. This is also an undeclared hazmat because there are no markings on the outside of the box indicating that there is a hazardous material in the box. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: The box was put in an unlined tote and sent to QA.
